mapper.insert: insert into spring_reply(RNO, BNO, REPLY, REPLYER) values(seq_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.select: SELECT RNO, BNO, REPLY, REPLYER, REPLYDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX(SPRING_REPLY IDX_REPLY)*/ ROWNUM RN, RNO, BNO, REPLY, REPLYER, REPLYDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM SPRING_REPLY WHERE BNO=#{bno} AND ROWNUM <= #{cri.page}*#{cri.amount}) WHERE RN>(#{cri.page}-1)*#{cri.amount}
select count(*) from spring_reply where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update spring_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate=sysdate where rno=#{rno}
